alert.note: Alert for Butler; Cowley; Sedgwick; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 8:17AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Cowley, eastern Sedgwick, southwestern Butler and northeastern Sumner Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 817 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wichita to near Derby to Wellington. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, Andover, Haysville, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Mulvane, Rose Hill, Belle Plaine, Oxford, Benton, Udall, Downtown Wichita, Kechi, Eastborough, Northeast Wichita, East Wichita, Mcconnell Air Force Base and South Wichita. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 0 and 17. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 21 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for south central Kansas.
